mapper.select: SELECT concat( brand.`name`, model.`name` ) AS carName FROM loan_car_info car left join car_detail detail on detail.id = car.car_detail_id LEFT JOIN car_model model ON model.id = detail.model_id LEFT JOIN car_brand brand ON brand.id = model.brand_id WHERE car.id = #{loanCarId}
